relationships.description: Ribis commenting on Mulvaney's political status
Mulvaney's comments about DJT affecting their relationship

analysis.purpose: To share insider political information about Mick Mulvaney's status and explain communication limitations
analysis.significance: Shows real-time political intelligence sharing about Trump administration personnel changes

notable_quotes: "Not yet but DJT not speaking to him with family that's why I cannt talk"
"Looks like Mick Mulvaney is out before he starts - knew it after his comments about DJT came public"
red_flags: References to restricted communication due to family presence

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion - appears to be routine political intelligence sharing

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - routine political conversation

public_knowledge.context: Discusses internal Trump administration dynamics regarding Mick Mulvaney's appointment as Acting White House Chief of Staff in December 2018

analysis.summary: Nicholas Ribis emails 'J' about political developments regarding Mick Mulvaney's status in the Trump administration, indicating Mulvaney may be 'out before he starts' due to comments about Trump, and explains he cannot talk freely because Trump is with family.
